DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to demonstrate the effects that lasofoxifene has on serum markers of bone metabolism.
DOC.brief_title: The Prevention Of Postmenopausal Osteoporosis With Lasofoxifene And Cytokine Evaluation
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal women over 50 years who have low bone mineral density. Women who are under 50 years of age, are premenopausal, or who currently have osteoporosis are excluded.
